original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 329.25/50 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 329.25/50 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 329.35/50 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.70/14.00 percent from 13.85/14.20 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.10/25 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.15/30 percent from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.30/40 percent from 14.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/45 percent, from 14.20/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.25/55 percent, from 14.25/55 percent. (Colombo/Nov29/2023)
